name: Beginner's Course
description: Start your language learning journey with our comprehensive beginner's course. Gain essential language skills and build a strong foundation in a fun and interactive environment.

name: Intermediate Course
description: Take your language skills to the next level with our intermediate course. Enhance your fluency, improve your accuracy, and deepen your understanding of the language.

name: Advanced Course
description: Challenge yourself with our advanced course designed for language enthusiasts. Master intricate language concepts, refine your communication skills, and gain cultural fluency at an advanced level.
